item.title: NLP Glossary
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Text Similarity using Vector Space Model The idea is to find common words within text. The figure below shows an example with a text with common words “”house” and “white”. It represents all texts with common words, calculating the frequency of each word. For example, looking at the red point (2,7), 2 is the number of times that the word “white” appears in the text and 7 is the number of times that the word “house” appears in the same text.
